alert.note: Alert for Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:59AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Phelps and southwestern Kearney Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 559 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Funk, or near Holdrege, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Axtell around 610 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Minden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
